definitions.definition: A blow that produces a muffled sound.
The sound of such a blow; a thud.
Used to replace the vulgar or blasphemous element in "what the hell" and similar phrases.
definitions.example: Where the thump have you been?!

definitions.definition: To hit (someone or something) as if to make a thump.
To cause to make a thumping sound.
definitions.example: The cat thumped its tail in irritation.

definitions.definition: To throb with a muffled rhythmic sound.
definitions.example: Dance music thumped from the nightclub entrance.
